title: MC进服务器弹出 a fatal error has occured. this connection is terminated
author: cheng646479765
txt_content:
MC进服务器弹出 a fatal error has occured. this connection is terminated
这种问题 谁知道怎么解决
我用自己电脑开服的

replies.author: cheng646479765
replies.txt_content:
刚才解决问题了 就是不能用 forge-1.7.2-10.12.2.1121-universal.jar
来开服
用原版服务端 开服就解决了
